titleStmt.title: September 29. 1642. The persons to whom the militia of the Citie of London is committed, for the safetie of the said Citie, have thought fit, and hereby declare.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Committee for the Militia

notesStmt.note: An order to the militia, directing what is to be done in the event of "any generall alarum by night or day.".
Identified as Wing P1668 on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 1785.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early Englsh books).
